Talk_PointRest_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You should take time to rest. Out here,
you need to keep your strength up.<sp:0:4:0>It's easy to get completely exhausted
without even realizing it.
Talk_Between_A_Rest_00_Back:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>The swing in temperature from day to
night sure makes traveling tricky.
Preparation is the key.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I always keep elixirs on hand that can heat
me up or cool me down. Without them, I'd
be done for!
Talk_Between_B_Rest_01_Back:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>I wonder what it's like to look down from
one of those floating islands.

Everything far below, the whole world
open to you...

<sp:3:0:2:0300>It's a shame I'm no good with heights.
I'd be scared to look down.
Balloon_Between_B_Rest: Wish I could ride a horse...
Greeting_Morning:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Getting things done early? That's a
good idea.
Guardian00: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Scare_00>What is that?! I'm no match for this!
Greeting_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Are you traveling too? You must have
had a rough time in that heat. I'm glad it
cooled off a little.
Talk_Between_B_Rest_00_Back:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>What do you see when you look up?


Those sky islands appeared after the
Upheaval, right? I have trouble believing
my own eyes some days.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>What are they? What's up there?<sp:5:1:0>
And why do they float?

I can't get those islands out of my mind.


<sp:3:0:2:0500>I bet someone standing up there would
see things no one's ever noticed before.<sp:5:0:0>
Maybe I'll work out a way to get there.
Talk_Between_A_Rest_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>I hear plenty of travelers through the
desert and Gerudo Canyon have collapsed
since the climate shifted.<sp:0:4:0>It should be fine if you have food that
suits the temperature though.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Well,<sp:5:0:0> just make sure you don't overdo it!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>That was one scary monster. I couldn't
do anything!
Talk_Between_A_Rest_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you can cook food that suits the
temperature, dealing with the hot and
cold weather here becomes a lot easier.
Traveling the canyon isn't something you
should take on lightly. You should do
everything you can to stay safe.
Talk_Between_B_Rest_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're looking for a stable, you can
take this road <clr:0000>northeast <clr:ffff>to find
<clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>.
There's also Gerudo Canyon Stable
to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0> Ah, shoot, never mind.
That one's closed.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Sad story... <sp:5:1:0>Horses couldn't make it
there in the harsh climate, so all the
business dried up.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Sorry you had to lend a hand there.
Take this, at least.
Greeting_Noon:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Ugh, it's blazing hot. Cool off in the shade
if you're feeling faint.
Talk_Between_B_Rest_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sadly, <clr:0000>Gerudo Canyon Stable <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>
isn't running anymore.

So if you need a stable,<sp:5:0:0> your best bet is
<clr:0000>Outskirt Stable <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Those monsters moved so fast!
I'm shaking just thinking about it.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>Those darn monsters. They're sure
getting confident!
Greeting_Night:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Brr, it's cold. You're going to freeze out
here if you're not prepared.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>I thought they were just small fry, so I
let my guard down.
Talk_PointA_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey. <sp:5:0:0>Did you also come here to relax?


The desert is harsh. But here, we can
stock up on clothes, food, and arrows.<sp:5:0:0> 
We get to sleep in nice, fluffy beds...
I almost wish I could stay awhile.
But my adventurous spirit won't let me
settle in one place for long.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>I underestimated them. They didn't seem
so tough...
Failed01: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>I can't believe it... Me, of all people...
Talk_PointA_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Here, not only do we have food and
clothes but we can also stock up on
arrows and sleep in fluffy beds...
It's a real oasis in the middle of this
harsh desert.
Atacked00: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>Th-this thing! It came out of nowhere!
Talk_PointA_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Come to think of it, the pond seems to
have dried up since last I was here...

Is that due to the Upheaval, I wonder?
Talk_Between_A_Rest_01_Back:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Me, I check my stock every day to make
sure I don't run out of elixirs to warm me
up or cool me down.
I wouldn't miss a single day! Don't you
forget to check your stock either.
Talk_PointA_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Say, it looks like the pond has a lot
more water than last I was here.

When the sand shroud disappeared,
I heard the waterways in Gerudo Town
started flowing again.
I wonder if the sand shroud was affecting
the pond as well.
Talk_PointB_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have absolutely no interest in ruins, but
I respect the folks who research them.<sp:0:4:0>Even in a harsh environment like this,
they keep up their studies.<sp:0:4:0>If you have any questions about ruins
or the Zonai,<sp:5:0:0> I bet they would be the
people to ask.
Talk_PointRest_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I found the perfect bit of roof, so I'm
taking a break.<sp:0:4:0>There aren't many places to rest in
Gerudo Canyon, after all.<sp:0:4:0>If you don't rest when you can, you'll
regret it. Oh yes, you will.
Talk_PointB_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you have any questions about ruins
or the Zonai, <sp:5:0:0>you should try asking the
Zonai Survey Team members.
